StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProspectCurrentNwaStatusDisposi.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaRowGuid uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT Top 1 cs.STATUS_TYPE, cs.STATUS_CODE, cs.DISPOSITION_CODE, sd.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON cs.STATUS_TYPE = sd.STATUS_TYPE AND cs.STATUS_CODE = sd.STATUS_CODE AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = sd.DISPOSITION_CODE WHERE n.rowguid = @NwaRowGuid ORDER BY cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID DESC
END
